prompt: E-commerce platform with payments and search

services.name: Azure Front Door
services.description: Global entry point routing e-commerce traffic to storefront

services.name: Azure Static Web Apps
services.description: Static storefront UI hosting and edge API gateway for SPA

services.name: App Service
services.description: Core e-commerce backend APIs for catalog, cart, checkout, and orders

services.name: Azure Functions
services.description: Serverless payment callbacks and asynchronous order workflows

services.name: SQL Database
services.description: Relational store for products, customers, orders, and payments

services.name: Azure Cache for Redis
services.description: Low-latency cache for sessions, product listings, and cart data

services.name: Storage Account
services.description: Blob storage for product images, assets, and receipts

services.name: Azure Cognitive Search
services.description: Full-text search index for products and categories

services.name: Microsoft Entra ID
services.description: Customer authentication and token issuance for secure access

services.name: Key Vault
services.description: Secure storage for payment gateway secrets and connection strings

services.name: Azure Monitor
services.description: Central monitoring and metrics for the e-commerce backend

services.name: Log Analytics
services.description: Log query and analysis workspace for operational insights

connections.label: Route customer HTTPS storefront requests to static web app
Redirect customers to Microsoft Entra ID for sign-in and token acquisition
Call backend e-commerce APIs with customer JWT tokens
Execute transactional queries for catalog, carts, orders, and payments
Read and update cached product lists, sessions, and cart data
Retrieve and store product images and digital receipt files
Submit product search queries and push index update operations
Invoke payment orchestration and webhook handlers for checkout
Update order and payment status after external gateway callbacks
Fetch payment gateway keys and database connection secrets at runtime
Emit application metrics and request telemetry for backend APIs
Ingest consolidated logs and metrics into workspace for analysis

workflow.description: Customer accesses the e-commerce storefront over HTTPS and is routed to the static web UI.
Customer signs in or registers using Microsoft Entra ID, and the UI obtains an access token.
Authenticated SPA calls backend APIs on App Service to load catalog, cart, and account data.
Backend APIs query SQL Database for authoritative product, customer, and order information.
To optimize performance, backend reads from and writes to Azure Cache for Redis for hot data such as product lists and cart state.
Product images and static assets are retrieved from the Storage Account and returned to the UI.
When customers search the catalog, the backend issues queries to Azure Cognitive Search and returns ranked results.
During checkout, App Service securely retrieves payment and database secrets from Key Vault before calling external payment providers.
Payment confirmations and webhooks are processed by Azure Functions, which update order and payment status in SQL Database.
App Service emits operational telemetry to Azure Monitor, which aggregates data and forwards it into Log Analytics for querying and dashboards.

services.description: Global entry point with TLS termination and routing to APIs

services.name: API Management

services.name: Service Bus

services.name: SQL Database
services.description: System of record for customers, orders, payments, and inventory

services.name: Azure Cache for Redis
services.description: Low-latency cache for sessions, cart, and hot product data

services.name: Storage Account
services.description: Stores product images, invoices/receipts, and export files

services.name: Azure Cognitive Search
services.description: Full-text and faceted search over product catalog and inventory metadata

services.name: Microsoft Entra ID
services.description: Customer/admin authentication and token issuance (OIDC/OAuth2)

services.name: Key Vault
services.description: Stores payment provider keys, connection strings, and signing secrets

services.name: Azure Monitor
services.description: Central metrics and platform monitoring for the application tier

services.name: Log Analytics
services.description: Central log store for query, alerting, and incident investigation

connections.label: Route HTTPS requests for storefront and APIs to the API gateway
Validate bearer tokens and enforce access policies per endpoint
Forward authorized API calls to backend services (catalog/cart/orders)
Provide payment provider secrets and database credentials at runtime
Read/write customer, cart, order, inventory, and payment records
Cache sessions, carts, and hot product detail lookups
Upload and retrieve product images, invoices, and order exports
Execute product search queries with filters, facets, and sorting
Publish catalog updates to keep search index in sync with product changes
Enqueue payment authorization/capture and order confirmation tasks
Deliver payment outcome events to update order state and notify user
Emit application metrics and traces for request latency and dependency health
Centralize logs for querying, alert rules, and incident triage

workflow.description: Customer opens the storefront; traffic is terminated and routed to the API layer.
User signs in; API gateway validates tokens and applies auth policies.
Backend loads product listings and details, using cache to reduce database reads.
Customer searches the catalog; backend queries the search index for results and facets.
Customer places an order; backend persists the order and enqueues payment processing.
Payment processing completes asynchronously; order status is updated accordingly.
Order artifacts (invoice/receipt) are stored and later retrieved for customer view.
Application telemetry is collected and centralized for monitoring and troubleshooting.

workflow.description: Client requests enter through global edge and are routed to the API gateway
API gateway validates user identity tokens before allowing access
Gateway forwards storefront operations to the web API
Web API reads cached catalog data and falls back to the database for order details
Web API stores assets and updates the product search index
Web API submits payment authorization to serverless processing
Payment processor records transaction outcomes in the database
Application telemetry is collected and centralized for diagnostics

services.name: Azure Front Door
services.description: Global entry point for shopper traffic with edge routing.

services.name: API Management
services.description: Publishes and secures commerce APIs for web and mobile clients.

services.name: App Service
services.description: Hosts storefront, cart, checkout, and order APIs.

services.name: Service Bus
services.description: Queues payment commands and decouples checkout from payment execution.

services.name: Azure Functions
services.description: Processes queued payment requests and updates order payment state.

services.name: SQL Database
services.description: System of record for products, carts, customers, orders, and payments.

services.name: Azure Cognitive Search
services.description: Provides fast product discovery, filtering, and relevance ranking.

services.name: Storage Account
services.description: Stores product images, receipts, and static commerce assets.

services.name: Microsoft Entra ID
services.description: Handles customer and admin authentication token issuance.

services.name: Key Vault
services.description: Stores payment provider API keys and signing secrets.

services.name: Azure Monitor
services.description: Collects application metrics, traces, and alert signals.

services.name: Log Analytics
services.description: Central workspace for searchable operational logs and investigations.

connections.label: Route shopper HTTPS requests to managed commerce APIs
Forward authenticated product, cart, and checkout API calls
Validate user tokens and enforce customer/admin access policies
Persist carts, orders, inventory reservations, and payment status
Execute full-text product search and facet filtering queries
Read and write product media and customer receipt files
Enqueue payment authorization command after checkout submission
Trigger serverless payment processing from queued checkout events
Fetch payment gateway credentials and signing secrets at runtime
Update payment outcome and finalize order transaction records
Send request latency, conversion funnel, and checkout failure telemetry
Stream consolidated metrics and logs for analysis and alert triage

workflow.description: Customer traffic enters through the edge and is routed to governed APIs.
API Management forwards storefront and checkout requests to the web application.
The application validates user identity and role permissions before processing actions.
Product discovery requests are served from search while catalog and order data are read from SQL.
Checkout submission writes order intent and publishes an asynchronous payment command.
Payment worker consumes queued command, retrieves secrets, and executes gateway transaction logic.
Payment result is persisted to SQL, and application telemetry is centralized for operations.

Read/write product, order, user data
Upload/download product images
Query product search index
Retrieve secrets, connection strings

Process orders, update inventory
Retrieve payment gateway keys
Send metrics and logs
Send metrics and logs

workflow.description: User accesses the e-commerce site via browser; Azure Front Door routes HTTPS request to App Service.
App Service authenticates user with Microsoft Entra ID and retrieves secrets (DB connection, API keys) from Key Vault.
App Service queries product catalog from Cosmos DB and product images from Storage Account; search queries are sent to Azure Cognitive Search.
When user places an order, App Service writes order to Cosmos DB and triggers an Azure Functions to process payment and inventory asynchronously.
Azure Functions retrieves payment gateway secrets from Key Vault, processes payment, updates order status in Cosmos DB.
All services send telemetry to Azure Monitor; Application Insights provides performance insights and dashboards.

workflow.description: Customer traffic enters through Front Door with WAF protection
API Management routes requests to App Service frontend
App Service authenticates users and queries product search
Product details loaded from Cosmos DB and images from Storage
User adds to cart and initiates checkout via Functions
Functions retrieves payment secrets and processes transaction
Order events queued to Service Bus for fulfillment
Service Bus triggers order persistence to Cosmos DB
App Service and Functions send telemetry to Monitor
Monitor aggregates logs into Log Analytics for analysis
